mapper.sql: SELECT E_KEY , E_NO , C_KEY_FK , E_TYPE , E_ID , E_PWD , E_NAME , E_JOBCODE_FK , E_DEPART_FK , E_ADDRESS , E_EXTEN , E_PHONE , E_EMAIL , E_HIRE_DATE , E_ENT_DATE , E_ENT_YN , E_PHOTO FROM EMPLOYEE
mapper.select: SELECT E.E_KEY,E.E_NO,E.C_KEY_FK,E.E_TYPE,E.E_ID,E.E_NAME,E.E_JOBCODE_FK,E.E_DEPART_FK,E.E_ADDRESS ,E.E_EXTEN, E.E_PHONE,E.E_EMAIL, E.E_HIRE_DATE,E.E_ENT_DATE,E.E_ENT_YN,E.E_PHOTO ,J.DIV_INFO AS "JOB", D.DIV_INFO AS "DEPARTMENT" FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DIVISION J ON(E.E_JOBCODE_FK = J.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON(E.E_DEPART_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE E.C_KEY_FK = #{companyK}
SELECT D.DIV_INFO AS "DEPARTMENT" FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DIVISION J ON(E.E_JOBCODE_FK = J.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON(E.E_DEPART_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE E.C_KEY_FK = #{compnayK} GROUP BY D.DIV_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (E_KEY, E_NO, C_KEY_FK, E_TYPE, E_ID, E_PWD, E_NAME, E_JOBCODE_FK , E_DEPART_FK ,E_ADDRESS, E_EXTEN, E_PHONE, E_EMAIL, E_BIRTH, E_HIRE_DATE, E_PHOTO) VALUES (SEQ_EMPLOYEE.NEXTVAL, #{eNo}, 1, 'A' , #{eId}, #{ePwd}, #{eName}, #{eJobcodeFk}, #{eDepartFk}, #{eAddress} , #{eExten}, #{ePhone}, #{eEmail}, #{eBirth}, #{eHireDate}, 'aa' )
mapper.select: SELECT E.E_ID AS "ID", D.DIV_INFO AS "DEPARTMENT", J.DIV_INFO AS "JOB", E.E_NAME AS "NAME", E.E_EXTEN AS "EXTEN", E.E_PHONE AS "PHONE", E.E_HIRE_DATE AS "HIREDATE", D.DIV_KEY AS "DEPARTKEY", J.DIV_KEY AS "JOBKEY", E.E_KEY AS "EKEY" FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DIVISION J ON(E.E_JOBCODE_FK = J.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON(E.E_DEPART_FK = D.DIV_KEY) ORDER BY E_DEPART_FK ASC , E_JOBCODE_FK ASC
SELECT DIV_INFO AS "JOB", DIV_KEY AS"JOBKEY" FROM DIVISION WHERE DIV_TYPE =1 ORDER BY DIV_KEY DESC
SELECT DIV_INFO AS "DEPARTMENT" , DIV_KEY AS"DEPARTKEY" FROM DIVISION WHERE DIV_TYPE =2 ORDER BY DIV_KEY ASC

SELECT E.E_ID AS "ID", D.DIV_INFO AS "DEPARTMENT", J.DIV_INFO AS "JOB", E.E_NAME AS "NAME", E.E_EXTEN AS "EXTEN", E.E_PHONE AS "PHONE", E.E_HIRE_DATE AS "HIREDATE", D.DIV_KEY AS "DEPARTKEY", J.DIV_KEY AS "JOBKEY", E.E_KEY AS "EKEY", E.E_NO AS "ENO", E.E_EMAIL AS "EMAIL"
FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DIVISION J ON(E.E_JOBCODE_FK = J.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON(E.E_DEPART_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE E.E_KEY = #{eKey}
